description: Captain Drummond becomes a prisoner when he intents to protect a beautiful heiress of an espionage organization.
name: Bulldog Drummond Escapes

original_info.id: Bulldog Drummond Escapes| Bulldog Drummond's Secret Police_1937
original_info.name: Bulldog Drummond Escapes/ Bulldog Drummond's Secret Police

review.name: Worth catching this Bulldog !
review.reviewBody: I was very pleasantly surprised by this racy little number,available in the UK on one DVD with two other movies from the same series.A simple but effective plot and some good stand out action scenes,pretty well mounted for a 'programmer'.Bulldog Drummond was served better by these movies than Dick Barton fared in the Hammer productions that came a dozen or so years later.Well worth watching,with a nice late thirties flavour,and far superior to the later Richard Johnson attempts at the character.Maybe its time for a resurgence of interest in Bulldog Drummond !! Ray Milland is a suave hero,and Heather Angel a pert heroine.When major stardom priced Ray Milland out of the series,John Howard played the part with equal charm.
